content: fit second round 6 7 times and then abbreviations every round until 24 sts remain make st = stitch sure you knit all the sts that have been knitted in the previous round and purl r = round the purled ones k = knit k2tog until end of round p = purl cut the yarn and pull it through the k2tog = knit two together remaining stitches weave in the ends ssk = slip slip knit pm = place marker pompom sm = slip marker use some more of your stash yarn and make a lovely pompom if you like i would love to see your lines of yarn and your hats on instagram #nowastehat design kristina jennische no waste hat snusfabriken@outlook com
